definitions.name: Contract Tooling
definitions.description: Tools for writing, debugging, and deploying smart contract systems.

subcategories.description: Frameworks and compilers for contract development.

subcategories.description: Tracing, debugging, and contract inspection tooling.

subcategories.description: Deployment automation and operational workflows.

subcategories.name: Solidity Libraries & Utilities
subcategories.description: Reusable Solidity utilities and smart contract helper libraries.

subcategories.name: ZK Circuits & Privacy
subcategories.description: Zero-knowledge circuit tooling and privacy-oriented contract components.

definitions.name: Security & Testing
definitions.description: Security analysis, testing, and correctness tooling for Ethereum systems.

subcategories.description: Automated code and vulnerability analysis.

subcategories.name: Fuzz/Property Testing
subcategories.description: Fuzzing and property-based testing tools.

subcategories.name: Formal Verification
subcategories.description: Mathematical and symbolic verification tools.

definitions.name: App Integration
definitions.description: Client-side and integration tooling for app and wallet experiences.

subcategories.description: Ethereum client libraries and language SDKs.

subcategories.name: Frontend/Integration Tooling
subcategories.description: UI kits and integration-focused developer tools.

subcategories.name: Wallet Integration & Auth
subcategories.description: Wallet connectors and authentication tooling.

subcategories.name: Account Abstraction & Tx Orchestration
subcategories.description: Account abstraction, bundling, and transaction orchestration tooling.

subcategories.name: Payments & DeFi Integration
subcategories.description: Payments rails, DeFi protocol integrations, and transaction flow SDKs.

subcategories.name: Governance & DAO Tooling
subcategories.description: Governance frameworks, voting integrations, and DAO developer tooling.

definitions.name: Network Infrastructure
definitions.description: Network, data, oracle, and interoperability infrastructure for Ethereum applications.

subcategories.name: RPC/Node Infrastructure
subcategories.description: RPC services, full nodes, and supporting infrastructure.

subcategories.name: Indexing & Data APIs

subcategories.description: Onchain analytics, dashboards, and production monitoring tools.

subcategories.name: Oracles & External Data

subcategories.name: Cross-Chain Infrastructure
subcategories.description: Bridging and cross-chain interoperability infrastructure.

subcategories.name: Storage & IPFS

definitions.name: Agent Tooling

subcategories.name: MCP Servers

subcategories.name: Agent Skills
subcategories.description: Reusable agent capabilities, prompts, and task modules for Ethereum workflows.

subcategories.description: Automation frameworks and orchestration patterns for multi-step agent execution.

definitions.name: Education & Standards
definitions.description: Educational resources and standards references for Ethereum developers.
